quality.preExisting: Multiple console errors preventing smooth task page loading

suggestedTasks.title: Debug and Resolve Console Errors on /tasks Page Load
suggestedTasks.description: Systematically investigate and resolve console errors preventing smooth task page rendering. Examine network request handling, state management, and component loading mechanisms. Use browser dev tools to capture full error stack traces and identify root causes of failures.
suggestedTasks.reason: Critical user experience issue blocking task page functionality

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Comprehensive Error Logging for Frontend Routes
suggestedTasks.description: Create a centralized error tracking mechanism for frontend routes to capture and log detailed error information. Develop a robust error handling strategy that provides meaningful diagnostics without exposing sensitive information to end-users.
suggestedTasks.reason: Improve debugging capabilities and system observability

patterns: Check for graceful error handling in network requests
Validate state management during page load
gotchas: Potential race conditions in async loading
